collective bargaining.translation[0].def: the discussions held between employers and a union in order to reach agreement on wages, working conditions etc
collective bargaining.translation[1].def: the discussions held between an employer and a TRADE UNION in order to reach an agreement on wages and working conditions
Contract workers fall outside collective bargaining agreements.
This ballot is about the right of our members to have their pay determined by free collective bargaining (=not controlled by the government or legal rules).
